input.sentences: my brother and i went to an activities workshop in town .
i had fun learning how to play a piano .
the other people in attendance were all very nice .
i even went to a meeting in which we discussed future activities .
at the end of the day | those in attendance took a group photo and we all had a good time .
output.sentences: A girl attended a workshop with a friend.
She learned to play the piano.
Her friend introduced her to other friends.
They all took a group photo together.
